metadata.bijbeltekst: The Passion According to St. Mark (Mark 15:29-34)

primair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: God intervenes in human history through the death of Jesus to deliver humanity from ultimate abandonment and inaugurate a new world order.

tekstueel_bewijs: the decisive intervention of God to deliver his children
Jesus of Nazareth goes his solitary way... pours out his life

object.identificatie: Deliverance from ultimate abandonment / The New World Order
tekstueel_bewijs: deliver his children from the unspeakable fate of ultimate abandonment
the cosmic scale has been conclusively tipped

zender.identificatie: God the Father / The Historic Liturgy
tekstueel_bewijs: the ancient liturgical wisdom given to the church
the only One who will deliver on his promise
for the sake of the whole world
those who can only get worse
ontvanger.positie_hoorder: The hearer identifies as the Receiver (the one needing salvation).

helper.identificatie: The Passion Narrative / The Church / Witnesses (Susan, Tutu, etc.)
tekstueel_bewijs: Our historic liturgy, however, guards against this fatal misunderstanding.
There are witnesses all over the world whose lives are a testimony
helper.rol_van_god: God is the Subject, not merely a Helper.
helper.rol_van_geest: Implicit indwelling power enabling witnesses to 'not engender fear'.

tegenstander.identificatie: Sin, Evil, Death, and Ultimate Abandonment
tekstueel_bewijs: sin and evil and death are not the last word
the unspeakable fate of ultimate abandonment
tegenstander.toelichting_ernst: The opponent is not just bad behavior but the 'present evil age' and the silence of a seemingly absent God.

secundair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The response of the faithful who live out the reality of the New World Order in the midst of the old.
secundair_narratief_programma.subject: The Believer (Susan Leckrone, Bishop Tutu, Sarah)
secundair_narratief_programma.toelichting_verhouding: The secondary program (ethics/witness) is presented as a fruit or 'evidence' of the primary program (God's act).

voorbeelden_god_subject: The Cross of Christ inaugurated the New World Order.
voorbeelden_mens_subject: We start out in a gala mood.
Susan Leckrone... is bathing out of a bucket.

voorbeelden: We must not say this... unless the death of Jesus Christ is somehow connected.
I desire to convey to you.
The church announces for all to hear.
The meaning of existence is revealed.
The only One who can deliver.
They were no longer able to engender fear.

modale_analyse.modale_interpretatie: The sermon focuses on God's 'ability' to save where humans are 'unable'. Grace is the endowment of a new reality (New World Order) that changes the capacity of the Subject.

semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.beweging_in_preek: From ~S2 (Palm Sunday joy) to S2 (The Cross/Abandonment) to S1 (The New World Order inaugurated in death).
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.theologische_resolutie: The tension is resolved not by avoiding S2, but by God entering S2 to create S1.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.ernst_van_s2: Extremely high; the 'Cry of Dereliction' is the 'proving ground'.

diagnostische_evaluatie.classificatie_toelichting: The sermon is profoundly theocentric. It places the agency of salvation entirely on God's 'decisive intervention' and treats human suffering as a condition requiring a Subject-switch to Christ.

indicatoren_moralisme.tekstueel_bewijs: I think of Dietrich Bonhoeffer... I think especially of Bishop Tutu.

indicatoren_genade.indicator: God as Subject of active verbs

indicatoren_genade.tekstueel_bewijs: the unspeakable fate of ultimate abandonment

exemplarisme_check.beschrijving: Witnesses are used, but not as 'models to imitate' by human will, but as 'evidence' of God's power already at work.
bijbelse_figuren_als_model: Jesus (as the one who identifies, but primarily as the one who intervenes)
exemplarisme_check.alternatieve_lezing: The sermon already provides a theocentric reading: Jesus is the Lord precisely in his abandonment.

identificatie_patroon.effect_op_hoorder: Comfort and awe; relief that the 'cosmic scale has been tipped'.
identificatie_patroon.theologische_implicatie: Monergistic salvation; God acts, man receives and then witnesses.

narratieve_coherentie.coherentie_beschrijving: The transition from the 'old world' headlines to the 'new world' of the Cross is logically and narratively seamless.
spanning_punten: The tension between the 'staggering' claim and the 'commonplace' reality.

soteriologie.tekstueel_bewijs: the cosmic scale has been conclusively tipped in the opposite direction

pneumatologie.competentie_schenking: The Spirit gives the 'Pouvoir' (power) to love enemies and not fear.

hamartologie.ernst_diagnose: Sin is linked to 'apocalyptic devastation' and 'ultimate abandonment'.

aanbevelingen.actantiele_audit_samenvatting: The sermon successfully maintains God as the Subject of the primary narrative program. The hearer is positioned as a beneficiary of a cosmic shift.

modale_balans.voorgestelde_balans: Maintain as is; this is a classic Passion sermon.

tegenstander_intensivering.huidige_status: The opponent (abandonment/death) is already sufficiently heavy.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterpiece of grace-oriented homiletics that avoids the trap of moralism by making the Cross a cosmic act of God rather than a human example.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retorische_analyse: While rhetoric would look at the use of headlines, Greimas shows these headlines function as the 'Opponent' to the 'Object' of the New World Order.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_exegese: Exegesis explains Mark 15; semiotics explains how the 'Cry of Dereliction' functions as the Subject's moment of maximum competence through apparent weakness.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_greimas: Reveals that the 'witnesses' (Tutu, etc.) are not the primary Subjects but 'Adjuvants' (Helpers) that prove the Subject's (God's) success.

appendices.notities: The sermon follows Fleming Rutledge's 'Grammar of Grace' almost perfectly.
